entries.name: Bag of Coins
entries.description: Tired of loose change in your pocket? Want an easier way to store your precious money? The Bag of Coins can help with that, providing a way to store all of your CunkCoin™ without wasting your precious inventory space! It also makes it easier to share coins with someone else -- just throw them in a bag! You can also put the bag in a dispenser and all of the coins will shoot out at once!

entries.name: Potion of Luck
entries.description:
A potion that may make your chances of getting something good a little higher.

FUN FACT: Did you know that 80% of people who gamble quit right before they're about to hit it big?

entries.name: Potion of Unluck
entries.description: You might not want to drink this, however it might be fun to trick a friend into trying.

entries.name: Potion of Nausea
entries.description: A potion that makes you feel sick. It's not very fun, but maybe it's a good way to get rid of unwanted guests.

entries.name: Pet Sprite
entries.description: Summons you any pet you'd like... but at what cost...

entries.name: Pet Dragon
entries.description: Summons a beautiful dragon hatchling that will follow you around!

entries.name: /dev/null
entries.description:
A miraculous innovation in technology! Leveraging a miniature black hole, this handy item can store any amount of an item you put into it. You can even place blocks that are held from within!

Note: this device is somewhat unstable, and removing more than one item from it at once will cause the hole to collapse, ejecting all of your items onto the floor.

entries.name: Plasteel Plating
entries.description: Looking for some new metal to spice up your house? Your towers? Your shrines? Plasteel might just be the material for you! Aside from looking really good, it can also be put into a stonecutter (note: it is NOT stone) to make a variety of different blocks, including Plasteel Casing, Plasteel Smooth Casing and Plasteel Pillars! And maybe more in the future, if we get the budget.

entries.name: Titanstone
entries.description: Straight from another dimension, right to you. As a mix of stone and titanium ore, this block is really hard.

entries.name: Blue Starry Block
entries.description: The Blue Starry Block is an animated decorative block type which shows twinkling blue stars on a black background. It is the blue-themed variant of the Gold Starry Block.

entries.name: Gold Starry Block
entries.description: The Gold Starry Block is an animated decorative block. When placed it shows twinkling, gold stars on a black background. It is the gold-themed variant of the Blue Starry Block.

entries.name: Foam Zombie
entries.description: The Growable FoamUps! ™ Zombie is a fun, interactive toy that grows when you put it in water! It's a great way to teach your kids about the undead, and it's fun for the whole family! Just don't let it get too big, or it might start eating your brains! (Note: FoamUps! ™ is not responsible for any injuries or deaths caused by the Growable FoamUps! ™ Zombie. Please use responsibly.)

entries.name: KB Slimeball
entries.description: Well... let's not dwell on the past.

entries.name: Staff of Smiting
entries.description: Let's just put it this way... do you want to learn how to fly?

entries.name: Launcher
entries.description: It's like the Staff of Smiting, but no friends are required!
